metadata.synopsis: The player just left Morphic Pool and witnessed END_HIghHall_Arrival. Absolute chaos, the streets of Baldur's Gate in flames. They have to make their way to the top of the Netherbrain somehow.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: This is chaos. Need to find a way through.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: One way or another, got to reach the top.
